data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Coventry get the game underway.
Amadou Bakayoko is replacing Tyler Walker for Coventry at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Sheffield.
The second-half has commenced. Sheffield Wed with the kick-off.
Joey Pelupessy (Sheffield Wed) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 64, The home team replace Liam Shaw with Jordan Rhodes.
Leo Ostigard (Coventry) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Tom Lees.
In the minute 72, Mark Robins (Coventry) is making a second substitution, with Julien Da Costa replacing Fankaty Dabo.
Coventry make their third substitution with Matt Godden replacing Maxime Biamou.
Mark Robins is making the team's fourth substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with Ryan Giles replacing Leo Ostigard.
In the minute 79, Sheffield Wed's Adam Reach has been booked in Sheffield.
Gervane Kastaneer is on a sub for Ben Sheaf for Coventry.
The home team have replaced Barry Bannan with Joost van Aken. This is the second substitution made today by Tony Pulis.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Elias Kachunga is replacing Josh Windass for the home team.
